# Orchid International College (OIC) - Website Documentation

This folder contains markdown documentation for the [Orchid International College](https://www.oic.edu.np/) website.

## About OIC

Orchid International College (OIC), affiliated with Tribhuvan University (TU), was established in 2010 AD. It is promoted by a group of experienced and dedicated academicians, computer engineers, management professionals, and a reputed software company in Nepal. Recognized as one of the Best IT Colleges in Kathmandu, the college aims to provide high-quality education enabling students to embrace the challenges of the modern world.

## Available Documents

| [BITM](04_BITM.md) | Bachelor of Information Technology Management |
| [BBM](05_BBM.md) | Bachelor of Business Management |
| [BBS](06_BBS.md) | Bachelor of Business Studies |
| [BSW](07_BSW.md) | Bachelor in Social Work |
| [Contact](08_Contact.md) | Contact information and location |

## Programs Offered

- **BSc CSIT** - 4-year IT/CS program (8 semesters, 126 credit hours)
- **BCA** - 4-year Computer Application program (8 semesters, 126 credit hours)
- **BITM** - 4-year IT & Management blend (8 semesters)
- **BBM** - 4-year Business Management program (8 semesters, 126 credit hours)
- **BBS** - 4-year Business Studies program
- **BSW** - 4-year Social Work program

## Contact Information
